title: Shadow Guardians
hero_title: Rescue in the Depths of Space
about_text: The Shadow Guardians navigate the infinite expanse, responding to distress beacons from distant star systems. As pioneers of interstellar rescue, we are committed to ensuring that every soul is safe among the stars.
anthem_description: Experience the spirit of the Shadow Guardians through our official anthem.
